title: Ce/W-MIL-88B(Fe) Photo-Fenton Material Achieving Synchronous Arsenate Uptake and Nitrite Resourcing: Unexpected Role of Arsenate in Boosting Photo-Fenton Activity
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00389F, Paper
Xi Chen, Jiabin Gao, Wei He, Hanxiao Liu, Mengyuan Wu, Meng Qi, Lijuan Yang, Feng Liu, Runlong Hao
Here, a novel MOF-based photo-Fenton material (Ce/W-MIL-88B(Fe)) was fabricated, which achieved synchronous arsenate (As(V)) uptake and nitrite (NO2-) resourcing. NO2- oxidation efficiency reaches 97% with a very low molar ratio...
